# Introduction

The document shows a calculation of summary statistics in R and a plot of the iris dataset.

```{r}
summary(mtcars)
```

```{python}
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
iris = load_iris(as_frame = True)
species = iris.target.replace(dict(enumerate(iris.target_names)))
df = iris.data.assign(species = species)
plt.scatter(df["petal length (cm)"],df["sepal length (cm)"])
plt.xlabel("petal length (cm)")
plt.ylabel("sepal length (cm)")
```
